ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Medieval Technologies
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start down the path of technologies associated with the medieval era, The path of medieval living and warfare begins here. This tech provides the basics of stew creation and home heating with the Stone hearth. The Smokehouse will get you through the winter with Dried fruits and jerked meats. The smithy will allow you to craft some basic weapons and armour, Not to mention low-tech lighting solutions to your medieval needs with the Street-lamp and interior Brazier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Ice Sculpting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Create all your basic and medieval walls out of the "New" Ice Resource. One of your colonist woke up one day and said "What if we made the walls outta Ice?". If you happen to live in the frozen north where the temperature is below freezing, making an "Ice Castle" Is a noteworthy idea. You can even decorate it with various ice sculptures. However, this might feel like a useless concept if you live in temperatures above freezing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Tailoring Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use the tailor's bench to craft essential clothing for your Medieval lifestyle. It's also quite effective in recycling old garments.

ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Crafting Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft essential tools and items for your Medieval lifestyle. The crafter's bench allows the production of various trade goods(Work in progress), and essential items to your medieval lifestyle and defensive needs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Defensive Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to create medieval style defences for your growing castle. Crenelated Parapet walls, The Roman era Ballista, and Steel Caltrops If you use these tools effectively, few will be able to challenge your medieval might.

ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Food Storage Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of Medieval Food-craft. The Food Prep Station will allow you to prepare your various stews in large quantities for your growing population. It will also allow you to learn the production of cheese. You can even keep your food cool by making ice and than sticking it in an ice box.

ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Advanced Smithing Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Higher temperatures means higher quality. Make better weapons and armor, full plate armour, the arbalest, and battle specific weapons will make short work of your enemies. Not to mention that you can now melt down and scrap metals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: (Medieval) Improved Defensive Systems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Embrasures, Murder Holes and the medieval Catapult.
